events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund as the size does not fit me at all.
System has categorised the case as a refund request based on customer message content mentioning refund and size issues.
A customer support agent specialized in refunds has been assigned to handle this case regarding the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed?
My order number is 452317. The jacket has only been tried on and has not been washed or damaged.
We can initiate the refund process for you. Please send back the jacket within 14 days using the prepaid return label we will email you.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back right away.
Your refund case has been successfully processed. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be issued within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you!
